name: SurvivalProject
description:
hello! this game is the starting of a big project that i woud like to finish someday ;u;

now its just a prototype that you can walk, jump, put blocks, and destroy blocks, save map, and make seeds, yeah just like minecraft!

this project in the future will be a game like terraria or mineblocks BUT it will not be just a clone of minecraft in 2d, there will have their own features like stamina, complex machines, ingeneering and much more!!

i hope you like this alpha that just to show it in public. thanks.

IMPORTANT INFO!!

WASDto move the playerRto reload the roomXto save the world with all changesZto reload the saved world1,2,3,4to select item 1=stone | 2=dirt | 3=oak log | 4=coal ore |Right clickplace blocksLeft clickremove blocksShiftto go faster
